accounts.name: ZerokStateV2Clean
accounts.description: Primary pool state account containing denomination, authority, Merkle frontier, root history, and VK reference

accounts.name: RootRingMetadata
accounts.description: Metadata for the sharded root ring buffer (capacity, shard count, active shard index)

accounts.name: RootRingShard
accounts.description: Individual shard of the root ring buffer containing root entries

accounts.name: VerifyingKeyAccount
accounts.description: Stores the Groth16 verifying key for proof verification

accounts.name: CommitmentRecord
accounts.description: PDA recording an individual deposit commitment

events.name: DepositEvent
events.description: Emitted on successful deposit (commitment, leaf_index, timestamp)

events.name: WithdrawalEvent
events.description: Emitted on successful withdrawal (recipient, nullifier_hash, fee)

events.name: RootRingUpdate
events.description: Emitted when a new root is added to the ring buffer

events.name: AuthorityChanged
events.description: Emitted when pool authority is transferred

events.name: SecurityConfigUpdated
events.description: Emitted when security parameters are updated

events.name: VkBound
events.description: Emitted when a verifying key is bound to a pool

events.name: VkFinalized
events.description: Emitted when a verifying key upload is finalized
